email_content:
Dear Dr. Strauss,

Thank you for your message. Below is the aggregated prevalence data from the population I counsel, formatted according to the specifications we discussed.

Column headers: Genetic_Marker | Prevalence_Percentage | Sample_Size | Notes

BRCA1 | 5 | confidential aggregate | Data are fully de-identified and represent the overall prevalence observed over the past year.

If you would like this in a separate CSV file, please let me know and I will forward it right away. Feel free to reach out with any additional formatting or clarification requests.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
